title: Well the little shits finally did it.
body:
Bronze has legit pissed me off to the point where im quitting ranked till next season.

11 games, all of them my team lost the fucking game for us.

and im not talking "oh blah blah fed blah blah" im talking i go fucking legendary against my lane opponent and roam and start doing my teams jobs for them and as far as im aware everythings going fine, then when late game hits i realise "holy shit im not just "carrying" Im the entire fucking team, the rest may aswell not exist they are that useless"

not to mention one game where i banned darius because well, darius, apparently one of the immature little shitstains (judging by the time i played the game it was a school kid, which fits my theory that kids under the age of fucking 15 are a tumor that needs to be cut out of the league player base if we want to maintain any semblance of health) wanted to play him.

So he responded by banning the champ i was gonna play (kat because i had enough of my teams being shit so i went full try hard hard carry mode) so i pulled my main out instead akali.

Which pissed him off more so he fed a whopping 31 kills.

plus the 16 from the support.

Intentionally fed 47 kills to the enemy.

And the sad part is? even with all those kills, i was still 1v3ing them.

And yet "yellow you are meant to be in bronze, if you werent you wouldnt be there" i fucking 1v3'd fed to the balls raid bosses with 2 kills and a handful of farm, im not meant to be in this fucking elo, period.

But legit, every single last complaint i have would be remedied by one simple fucking thing.

Individual mmr scaling.

Because this isnt a fucking team game, its a 10 man circle jerk.

The only time league is a team game is in ranked 5's.

So adios season 6, ill wait season 7's mmr reset so i dont have to win 100000 fucking games in a row to go up one fucking tier and convince the game i belong there so it doesnt give me -fucking15 lp.

replies.body:
I dunno man I think just change your name to the Green Mile because you're a dead man walking in ranked

I struggle to see how all of your last 11 games your team lost you the game, you have the wrong mentality to escape bronze. At least get a full tier 3 rune page with at least 822 ranked games played this season you should have enough IP to set one up. 

I can see you having the same issues next season with your win loss this season not being the best, anyways good luck in season 7

i have 3 full tier 3 rune pages.

The cdr runes are tier 2 because i only needed 10% and the only benefit of going t3 runes would mean i could put more runes of a different stat in, so i can get what, 3 more magic pen?

Oh and i can CLEARLY see how my teams lost me those games, but i was in those games, so i have information that you cant get by looking at the end screen.

Things like HOW that vayne died so many times instead of just that she died alot.
Its bronze, most people wouldn't think come to think of how to improve themselves.
I think you need to focus more on your builds, can't carry a game with a bad build

My builds are fine, Every single last item i purchase is justified based on a logical thought pattern, unless im playing a troll build.

For instance the lich bane on kat, will i use that proc very often in burst? not against targets i can one shot with q and w but if a target lasts past that its an extra 50% ap ratio on the automatic auto after e, its also extra tower damage, infact that sheen purchase has gotten me tower first blood more times than i can count.

That and it gets me the last 10% cdr i need to reach 45% cdr to have a 4 second ult cooldown after a kill which trust me, is terrifying in team fights.

or akali, most people scoff at my 2 ad items, but theres a reason i have a much higher performance average on akali then literally every other player in my elo thats played akali, and its due to the interaction between said ad items and her passive. turns akali from just a weaker diana or kat that can only win games in the 20 minute mark to a late game duelist that along side being able to burst people down can literally sit there shredding through tanks without dying because shes healing herself for 65% of the damage she does.
